task.title: Installing
task.shortdesc: You can install on a system that runs Microsoft Windows. You either can install as a stand-alone installation or as a plug-in to an existing Eclipse 3.2 installation.

step.stepresult: The Open Fileâ€“Security Warning window opens.

step.cmd: On the Welcome page, click Next.
On the License Agreement page, click I accept the terms of the license agreement, and then click Next.
On the Setup Type Information page, click Next.
On the Select Setup Type page, select the installation type, and then click Next.
On the Summary page, click Next .
step.info: By default, is installed to C:\Program Files\IBM\TaskModeler 5.

step.cmd: On the Successful Installation page, click Finish.
